articles.title: Trump administration welcomes 59 white South African refugees into the U.S., sparking political debate - NBC News
articles.description: American officials welcomed a group of 59 Afrikaners, who are from the white ethnic minority who ruled South Africa during apartheid, to the U.S. as refugees.
articles.content: American officials welcomed a group of 59 white South Africans at Washington Dulles International Airport on Monday afternoon, in a ceremony greeting them as refugees under the argument that they are… [+7014 chars]

articles.title: Measles Could Become Endemic in US if Surge Continues, Expert Warns - ScienceAlert
